task.title: Creating a Deliverable Assignment
task.shortdesc: You can create assignments on Moodle that require students to submit a deliverable.

taskbody.context:
Students can click on the assignment item on the home page and then submit their assignments. You will then be able to grade these assignments within Moodle.
To create a deliverable-based assignment:

step.cmd: Add an Assignment item to the home page.
Type a name for the assignment into the Assignment name textbox and type a description of the assignment into the Description textbox.
Use the Due date dropdowns to set the date and time by which students must submit the assignment.
Use the Cut-off date dropdowns to set the date and time when students may no longer submit the assignment.
Click Submission types and set the ways in which students can submit their work.
Click the Grade tab and type the point value of the assignment into the Maximum grade textbox.
Click the Activity completion tab and click the checkbox beside "Student must submit to this activity to complete it.
Click Save and return to course.
